column1: #Text=" Sokka says : " I mean , you 're almost there .
#Text=" Katara says : " At this rate , we wo n't do enough damage before the drill reaches the wall .
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't know how many more of those I have in me .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Do you hear that ?
#Text=We better get out of here fast !
#Text=The drill has made contact with the wall of Ba Sing Se .
